Mal'Ganis.name: Fel Claws
Mal'Ganis.description: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 72 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.

Mal'Ganis.name: Necrotic Embrace
Mal'Ganis.description: Desecrate the air, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and gaining 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

Mal'Ganis.name: Night Rush
Mal'Ganis.description: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.

Mal'Ganis.name: Carrion Swarm
Mal'Ganis.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 100% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

Mal'Ganis.name: Dark Conversion
Mal'Ganis.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

Mal'Ganis.name: Vampiric Touch
Mal'Ganis.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 45% of damage dealt to enemy Heroes and 15% of damage dealt to non-Heroes.

1.name: Winged Guard
1.description: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

1.name: Vampiric Aura
1.description: Mal'Ganis and nearby allied Heroes heal for 10% of Physical Damage dealt.

1.name: Time to Feed
1.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 48 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.

4.name: Fueled by Torment
4.description: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 12 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 15% more Hero damage into healing.

4.name: Might of Sargeras
4.description: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50, but the duration is reduced to 2 seconds.

4.name: Echo of Doom
4.description: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 50 (+4% per level) damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Mal'Ganis retains 25 Armor for 1 more second.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

7.name: Black Claws
7.description: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 45% more damage.

7.name: Will of Tichondrius
7.description: The third slash of Fel Claws steals 4% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes.

7.name: Spreading Plague
7.description: After Night Rush expires, deal 30 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

7.name: Nightmare Fuel
7.description: Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage while in a bush and for 4 seconds after leaving. They also deal 125% more damage to Sleeping targets.

10.name: Carrion Swarm
10.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 100% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

10.name: Dark Conversion
10.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

13.name: Deep Sleep
13.description: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

13.name: The Night Beckons
13.description: After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Blood Rush
13.description: When Mal'Ganis is healed, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%.

16.name: Plague Bats
16.description: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 85 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Frenzied Assault
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage grant 40% Attack Speed and 10% increased Physical Damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Blind as a Bat
16.description: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.

20.name: Seeker Swarm
20.description: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Wrath of Nathreza
20.description: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

20.name: Vanquish the Weak
20.description: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 15% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

20.name: Alone in the Dark
20.description: Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.
